name: Zombie Legion
flavor: A large pack of undead, still powerful despite their rotting flesh.

features.name: Horde (2d6+5) - Passive
features.desc: When Legion has half or more HP marked, standard attack deals 2d6+5 physical damage instead.

features.name: Unyielding - Passive
features.desc: Legion has resistance to physical damage.

features.name: Relentless (2) - Passive
features.desc: Legion can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Overwhelm - Reaction
features.desc: When Legion takes Minor damage from attack within Melee, mark a Stress to make standard attack with advantage against the attacker.
